Plot: Uncle Elroy and Day Day owe money on taxes so Craig finds a way to steal from the next door neighbors to pay off the taxes so Uncle Elroy's house doesn't get put up for auction.
Title: Next Friday
Writer: Ice Cube (characters), DJ Pooh (characters), Ice Cube
Actors: Ice Cube, Mike Epps, Justin Pierce, John Witherspoon
tomatoConsensus: Next Friday lacks the fun of the original Friday. The movie is messy and plotless and relies on unfunny vulgar gags.
